subject: Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The N.C.A.A. has told Louisiana State that it did not find any violations beyond what the university reported after an internal investigation into allegations of improper contact between a player and an assistant coach.
snippet: The N.C.A.A. has told Louisiana State that it did not find any violations beyond what the university reported after an internal investigation into allegations of improper contact between a player and an assistant coach.
